title: Exact Solution of a N-body Problem in One Dimension
abstract: Complete energy spectrum is obtained for the quantum mechanical problem of N one dimensional equal mass particles interacting via potential $$V(x_1,x_2,...,x_N) = g\sum^N_{i < j}{1\over (x_i-x_j)^2} - {\alpha\over \sqrt{\sum_{i < j} (x_i-x_j)^2}}$$ Further, it is shown that scattering configuration, characterized by initial momenta $p_i (i=1,2,...,N)$ goes over into a final configuration characterized uniquely by the final momenta $p'_i$ with $p'_i=p_{N+1-i}$.
